s.description: string after which we filter emails

item_id.description: ID of the module or lesson

items_ids.description: IDs of selected items for bulk edit

source.description: Description of where the request has come from. Example: ThriveCart

first_name.description: First name of the customer that made the purchase

last_name.description: Last name of the customer that made the purchase

email.description: The email address of the customer that’s made the purchase.This should be the email address to which course access will be given

customer_id.description: The customer ID associated with the purchase generated by the vendor

total.description: The total amount paid by the customer

currency.description: The currency paid by the customer

processor.description: Label for the payment processor used to make the payment

charges.description: A list of charges/order items that make up an order

type.description: Used to determine whether this is a single purchase or a recurring purchase

courses.description: An array of Thrive Apprentice course ID's or Course Bundles that the customer should receive access to.

name.description: Human readable name for item/product.  Example: "Active Growth Membership ($100/month)

amount.description: Total paid for the line item

transaction_id.description: Unique ID for the transaction from vendor

order_id.description: ThriveCart order ID. The order ID associated with the purchase.

offset.description: Used in pagination. An integer from where the query should start fetching items

number.description: Used in pagination. The maximum number of items to fetch

coursePercentageMin.description: The minimum completion percentage per member

coursePercentageMax.description: The maximum completion percentage per member
